Package org.douggschwind.games.dicegames.boggle

package org.douggschwind.games.dicegames.boggle
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BoardLocationsVisited
    Records the board locations that have been visited.
    Boggle
    This class is the entry point into which you can see the game being setup and the possible words on the game board to be found.
    Boggle4x4Dice
    This is the dice configuration for the English Boggle 16 dice version: Die0: R, I, F, O, B, X Die1: I, F, E, H, E, Y Die2: D, E, N, O, W, S Die3: U, T, O, K, N, D Die4: H, M, S, R, A, O Die5: L, U, P, E, T, S Die6: A, C, I, T, O, A Die7: Y, L, G, K, U, E Die8: Qu, B, M, J, O, A Die9: E, H, I, S, P, N Die10: V, E, T, I, G, N Die11: B, A, L, I, Y, T Die12: E, Z, A, V, N, D Die13: R, A, L, E, S, C Die14: U, W, I, L, R, G Die15: P, A, C, E, M, D
    Boggle5x5Dice
    This is the dice configuration for the English Boggle 25 dice version: Die0: Qu, B, Z, J, X, K Die1: T, O, U, O, T, O Die2: O, V, W, R, G, R Die3: A, A, A, F, S, R Die4: A, U, M, E, E, G Die5: H, H, L, R, D, O Die6: N, H, O, T, H, O Die7: L, H, N, R, O, D Die8: A, F, A, I, S, R Die9: Y, I, F, A, S, R Die10: T, E, L, P, C, I Die11: S, S, N, S, E, U Die12: R, I, Y, P, R, H Die13: D, O, R, D, L, N Die14: C, C, W, N, S, T Die15: T, T, O, T, E, M Die16: S, C, T, I, E, P Die17: E, A, N, D, N, N Die18: M, N, N, E, A, G Die19: U, O, T, O, W, N Die20: A, E, A, E, E, E Die21: Y, I, F, P, S, R Die22: E, E, E, E, M, A Die23: I, T, I, T, I, E Die24: E, T, I, L, I, C
    BoggleDice
    Represents the abstraction that abstracts away whether we are using a 4x4 game board or a 5x5 game board.
    DieLetter
    Instances of this class represent the state of one die on the Boggle game board.
    LetterNode
    An instance of this class represents a letter in a sequence of letters in a word.
    WordTree
    Houses an n-ary tree that decomposes our list of valid words into a sequence of nodes for ease in determining if a sequence of letters is a word or the first letters of one to many valid words.
